== Perinthalmanna (M) (803270) ==

== Demography & Population ==

Perinthalmanna (M) is a town in the [[Perinthalmanna]] taluka of [[Malappuram]] district with an area of 34.41 sq. km. and harbouring 10287 households with total population of 49723 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Malappuram]] is at a distance of 21 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 360 km. Male population is 23542 and female population is 26181. Scheduled Caste population is 5175 and Scheduled Tribes population is 103. Census Location Code of the town is 803270<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (Population 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Municipality'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Malappuram (m + og) at a distance of 21 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 90 km. Railway station is at Angadippuram at a distance of 2 km.
